items.summary: Remove all backend code in the sendBTC method (backend/main.mo) that validates whether the destination Bitcoin address corresponds to a registered user account or user profile, so that any Bitcoin mainnet address can be used as a transfer destination without triggering a 'user not registered' error.

Update any backend error handling or validation logic in the sendBTC flow to ensure that address format validation (if any remains) only checks Bitcoin mainnet address syntax via the blockchain API, not app user registry existence.
